citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility found a hedgehog with an abnormal tissue swelling on the abdomen with litter bedding attached. They moved
the hedgehog off litter bedding and started warm baths to clean the area. However, the attending veterinarian was not
notified of this condition. Failure to communicate abnormalities found with animals to a veterinarian can result in a delay in
treatment and prolonged pain and suffering. Correct by 24 Feb 2024 by ensuring there is a mechanism of direct and
frequent communication with a veterinarian so that timely and accurate information on problems of health, behavior, and
well-being are conveyed. This communication allows the veterinarian to examine the animal and ensure that appropriate
treatment is provided as required by section 2.40(b)(2).
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
